title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.12 - Excused absences
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.12 - Excused absences

State Regulations

If a youth has been AWOL and, upon return, presents an excuse
for all or part of his/her absence, which excuse is accepted by the program
director: (a) the program director
shall document the receipt and acceptance of such excuse; (b) the excused absence shall not be grounds
to terminate participation in the day placement program; and
(c) the youth shall receive credit against
the term of his/her placement for the period of the excused absence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
178.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
